燡字的基本解释

燡
yì
〔燡燡〕光明，如“赫燡燡而烛坤。”
光耀：“园蘅眩红花，湖荇燡黄华。”

燡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yì］
［《廣韻》羊益切，入昔，以。］
(1)辉映，映照。
(2)光明貌。

燡字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　燡； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页684第21
【廣韻】羊益切【集韻】夷益切，?音亦。【廣韻】火甚之貌。【王延壽·魯靈光殿賦】赫訓光燡。燡燡而爥坤。　【集韻】本作?。光也。或作曎。◎按廣韻，?訓火甚，分爲二。似不應分。

燡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
燡字的起名意思

辉映，映照；光明貌。

blazing
Basic explanation of words
blazing
yì
〔燡燡] Bright, such as "He 燡燡 and Zhukun."
Guangyao: "The garden is dazzling with red flowers, and the lake is yellow."
blazing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yì］
["Guangyun" Yang Yi cut, into the past, to. ]
(1) Shining, reflecting.
(2) Bright appearance.
blazing
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　燡; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 684 21
[Guang Yun] Sheep Yi Cut [Ji Yun] Yi Yi cut, sound also. [Guang Yun] The appearance of the fire. 【Wang Yanshou·Lu Lingguang Temple Fu】He Xun Guangxun.燡燡 and 爥坤.　【Jiyun】This work?. Light also. Or make a break. ◎According to Guangyun, "Teaching Fire", it is divided into two. It doesn't seem to be divided.
